Head: Hot
Flushed cheeks
Low spirited
Dull during the day, wakeful at night
Unable to think
Stomach: Sensation of a lump. As if hard boiled egg had lodged near the cardiac end of the stomach
Constriction at the bottom of the stomach. As if stomach was knotted up
Loss of appetite in the morning, craving at noon and night
Back: Rheumatic pains and aching in bones
Chest: Pain as if something was lodged in the chest and has to be coughed up
Stomach acids in the mouth after cough
Difficulty breathing. Worse when lying down
Sleep: Wakeful and restless at night with hunger
